DOC.brief_summary: The main objective evaluate food effect pharmacokinetic profile YH4808 100 mg b.i.d YH4808 300 mg oral administration healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Food Effect Pharmacokinetics YH4808 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subjects sign write consent receive thorough explanation trial purpose , content , characteristic investigational drug Healthy male volunteer age 20 45 year old Weight : 50kg , within ±20 % ideal body weight Subjects determine appropriate screen Clinically significant disorder liver , kidney , cardiovascular , respiratory system , endocrine system CNS physical examination clinical laboratory test medical history malignant tumor psychological disease Medical history gastrointestinal disease acid restrain surgery , gastric/esophagus surgery ( exclude appendectomy , hernia surgery ) A history hypersensitivity drug clinically significant allergic disease Clinically significant abnormal value blood chemistry ( ≥ 1.5 fold normal upper limit level SGOT , SGPT ) Subjects history drug abuse positive result urine drug screen Subjects take usual dose prescription drug within 14 day treatment use usual dose OTC drug within 7 day treatment ( cf , able enrol study accord investigatory consideration ) Subjects participate another clinical trial within 2 month enrol study Subjects donate whole blood within 2 month component blood within 1 month donate within 1 month treatment Subjects drank Over 21 units/week alcohol subject unable stop drinking alcohol hospitalization Subjects stop smoke within 3 month treatment Subjects beverage contain grapefruit within 24hrs hospitalization beverage contain grapefruit hospitalization Subjects beverage contain caffeine hospitalization Subjects clinically significant observation consider unsuitable base medical judgment investigator
